title: Green Time Vegetarian Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Thai, Take-out, Asian
description: A vegetarian restaurant (with vegan options) located next to EFL learning center near to the Ping River and to the Wat Gate Khar Rham Temple for which the area is named. Has tables outside in the green courtyard. Try the fruit shakes. The view of a yellow traditional Thai style house gives a nice relaxing feeling.
